notes_zh: 本证据库用于肿瘤支持治疗与整合医学教育，不替代标准肿瘤治疗。请将所有草药/补充剂与肿瘤团队沟通，关注相互作用与安全监测。
notes_en: Educational integrative oncology library; not a substitute for standard cancer care. Discuss all herbs/supplements with the oncology team and monitor safety/interactions.

items.name_zh: 化疗期中西医合用：安全核对清单
items.summary_zh: 用于化疗/放疗期间考虑使用中药、草本或补充剂时的沟通与监测要点：明确目标（减轻毒副反应/改善食欲/睡眠），记录所有成分与剂量；关注肝肾功能、凝血、感染风险与过敏；避免来源不明产品；出现发热、黄疸加重、严重腹泻/出血等红旗症状应立即就医。
items.summary_en: Key communication and monitoring points when considering herbs/supplements during chemo/radiation: define goals, document all ingredients/doses, monitor liver/kidney function and bleeding/infection risk, avoid unknown products; seek urgent care for red flags (fever, worsening jaundice, severe diarrhea/bleeding).
risks: 血小板低下/抗凝治疗/肝肾功能异常者需格外谨慎
避免替代标准抗肿瘤治疗
interactions: 与抗凝/抗血小板药、部分靶向药或免疫治疗可能存在相互作用；需由肿瘤团队评估

items.name_zh: 胰腺癌“非常规/替代疗法”证据概览（谨慎）
items.name_en: Unconventional/Alternative Treatments in Pancreatic Cancer (Evidence Overview)
items.summary_zh: 系统综述总结了胰腺癌相关“非常规疗法”的临床研究，整体证据质量参差且异质性高。用于临床沟通时应强调：任何补充/替代疗法不应延误标准治疗；若作为支持治疗需关注安全性、药物相互作用与真实终点（OS/PFS/QoL）。
items.summary_en: A systematic review summarizes clinical studies on unconventional treatments in pancreatic cancer; evidence is heterogeneous and variable. Key message: do not delay standard care; if used as supportive care, focus on safety, drug interactions and patient-relevant outcomes (OS/PFS/QoL).
risks: 信息误导风险；避免使用夸大疗效的产品/疗法
interactions: 部分草本/补充剂可能影响凝血或肝酶，从而影响治疗安全

refs.title: Unconventional Treatments for Pancreatic Cancer: A Systematic Review

items.name_zh: 中医药联合化疗（32例临床研究）
items.name_en: TCM Combined with Chemotherapy (32‑patient clinical study)
items.summary_zh: 单中心临床研究：晚期胰腺癌患者接受“中医药联合化疗”与仅化疗对照比较。文中报道联合组中医证候评分改善、生活质量提高，且不良反应发生率更低。局限：样本量小、单中心、干预细节与标准化程度有限，需更高质量研究验证。
items.summary_en: Single-center clinical study comparing TCM+chemo vs chemo alone in advanced pancreatic cancer. Reported improvements in TCM symptom scores and QoL, with lower adverse-event rates in the combined group. Limitations: small sample, single center, limited standardization; higher-quality trials needed.
use_cases: 减轻化疗相关不适（支持治疗）
risks: 研究层级有限；具体方药/剂量需在专业医师监管下个体化
interactions: 化疗期间需监测肝肾功能与骨髓抑制；用药清单需与肿瘤团队共享

refs.title: Clinical Study of 32 Patients with Advanced Pancreatic Cancer Treated with Traditional Chinese Medicine Combined with Chemotherapy
refs.journal: Alternative Therapies in Health and Medicine

items.summary_zh: 综述提及其在肝胆胰相关肿瘤临床研究中的应用，常作为辅助/支持治疗探索。对胰腺癌的证据多来自小样本或间接证据，需谨慎解读；若使用应关注产品来源与肝肾监测。
items.summary_en: Referenced in clinical studies in hepatobiliary-related cancers as an adjunct/supportive therapy. Evidence specific to pancreatic cancer is limited or indirect; interpret cautiously and monitor product quality and organ function.
risks: 证据外推风险；避免替代标准治疗
interactions: 与化疗合用需监测肝功能与过敏反应

refs.title: Traditional Chinese medicine for the treatment of cancers of hepatobiliary system: from clinical evidence to drug discovery

items.summary_zh: 综述中作为临床研究中出现的中医药制剂之一。临床证据与适应证需以具体试验为准；潜在心律/电解质相关风险需评估，建议仅在医疗监管下使用。
items.summary_en: Listed among TCM therapeutics appearing in clinical trials. Indications and benefit/risk should follow specific trials; potential cardiac/electrolyte risks warrant medical supervision.
risks: 潜在心脏相关不良反应风险；禁用于来源不明制剂
interactions: 与影响心律或电解质的药物合用需谨慎

refs.title: Traditional Chinese medicine for the treatment of cancers of hepatobiliary system: from clinical evidence to drug discovery

items.name_zh: 依卡替尼（Icaritin，天然产物衍生物）
items.summary_zh: 综述提及其在肝胆胰系统肿瘤的临床研究与药物发现价值。对胰腺癌的临床证据需以具体试验为准；作为药物/成分应关注药代与肝功能监测。
items.summary_en: Review highlights clinical evidence and drug-discovery potential in hepatobiliary system cancers. Pancreatic-cancer-specific clinical evidence depends on individual trials; monitor pharmacokinetics and liver function.
use_cases: 药物发现/临床研究条目
risks: 作为药物级干预需遵循试验/处方规范
interactions: 可能与肝酶代谢相关药物相互作用，需监测

refs.title: Traditional Chinese medicine for the treatment of cancers of hepatobiliary system: from clinical evidence to drug discovery

items.summary_zh: 作为补充/草本使用较常见，研究多聚焦疲劳、食欲与生活质量等支持性结局；证据质量不一。化疗/免疫治疗期间使用需评估相互作用与血糖、血压影响。
items.summary_en: Commonly used supplement; studies focus on supportive outcomes (fatigue, appetite, QoL) with variable quality. During chemo/immunotherapy, assess interactions and effects on glucose/blood pressure.
risks: 可能影响血糖/血压；来源与剂量不确定风险
interactions: 可能影响免疫调节或CYP代谢通路；用药清单需共享

refs.title: Unconventional Treatments for Pancreatic Cancer: A Systematic Review

items.summary_zh: 多为机制与前临床研究；胰腺癌临床证据有限。作为补充剂高剂量可能增加出血风险或加重胃肠道不适；化疗期不建议自行大剂量使用。
items.summary_en: Mostly mechanistic and preclinical evidence; limited clinical data in pancreatic cancer. High-dose supplementation may increase bleeding risk or GI upset; avoid self-prescribed high doses during chemo.
interactions: 与抗凝/抗血小板药物合用需谨慎

refs.title: Unconventional Treatments for Pancreatic Cancer: A Systematic Review

items.name_zh: 噬菌体展示肽靶向策略（研究进展，非TCM）
items.summary_zh: 综述介绍噬菌体展示技术筛选高亲和力肽用于胰腺癌早期检测、靶向递送与治疗的研究进展。属于实验与转化研究方向，不属于中医药治疗；可作为“替代/创新策略”证据条目补充展示。
items.summary_en: Review describes phage display to identify high-affinity peptides for early detection, targeted delivery and treatment in pancreatic cancer. This is translational research (non-TCM) and included here as an innovation/alternative strategy reference.
risks: 目前主要为研究阶段，临床可及性有限
interactions: 与临床治疗方案需由肿瘤团队评估
